result.arabic_text: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ ءَايَةٗ يُعۡرِضُواْ وَيَقُولُواْ سِحۡرٞ مُّسۡتَمِرّٞ
result.translation: Na wakiona Ishara hugeuka upande na husema: Huu uchawi tu unazidi kuendelea.
result.footnotes: Na makafiri wakiona Ishara, yaani muujiza mkubwa, wao hupuuza wakaacha kuuamini. Bali husema: Huu ni uchawi wa daima unaendelea!
